mdRecord.dcterms:title: You Can't Take It With You by George S. Kaufman and Moss Hart
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Playbill for the May 4-29, 1976 production of You Can't Take It With You by George S. Kaufman and Moss Hart. Directed by Charles Maryan. Scenery for the original Tidewater production by Bennet Averyt. Costumes by Carr Garnett. Lighting by Don Coleman.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Theater
Virginia
mdRecord.dcterms:provenance: The original object is the property of the Barter Theatre in Abingdon, VA (https://www.bartertheatre.com/). This digital surrogate is made publicly available by the Barter Theatre for use in research, teaching, private study, and other educational purposes. Responsibility for any use of these materials rests exclusively with the user. When using this item, users should give proper credit to the owner of the original object as well as to Virginia Tech Libraries.
Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University. University Libraries
